reference_a:

  title = {Dynamics of attachment and emotion regulation in daily life: {{Uni-}} and bidirectional associations},
  shorttitle = {Dynamics of attachment and emotion regulation in daily life},
  author = {Tammilehto, Jaakko and {Bosmans ,Guy} and {Kuppens ,Peter} and {Flykt ,Marjo} and {Peltonen ,Kirsi} and {Kerns ,Kathryn A.} and Lindblom, Jallu},
  date = {2022-08-18},
  journaltitle = {Cognition and Emotion},
  volume = {36},
  number = {6},
  eprint = {35674671},
  eprinttype = {pubmed},
  pages = {1109--1131},
  publisher = {Routledge},
  issn = {0269-9931},
  doi = {10.1080/02699931.2022.2081534}

additional_comments: no day and beep information available

features.name: discrete_time
features.coding:
Discrete time (1 hour and 43 min blocks 1= first block to 92 =
last block)

features.name: time_elapsed
features.coding:
Time of receiving EMA questionnaires in hours from the
beginning of the study

features.name: reappraisal
features.coding:
I thought about the situation in a more positive way
1 = not at all
5 = very much

features.name: rumination
features.coding:
I thought over and over again about the negative situation and
feelings
1 = not at all
5 = very much

features.name: suppression
features.coding:
I avoided showing my situation-elicited negative feelings
1 = not at all
5 = very much

features.name: feel_loved
features.coding:
I feel loved
1 = strongly disagree
7 = strongly agree
Part of attachment security

features.name: rely_on
features.coding:
I feel like I have someone to rely on
1 = strongly disagree
7 = strongly agree
Part of attachment security

features.name: need_love
features.coding:
I feel a strong need to be unconditionally loved right now
1 = strongly disagree
7 = strongly agree
Part of attachment anxiety

features.name: share_feelings
features.coding:
I want to share my feelings with someone
1 = strongly disagree
7 = strongly agree
Part of attachment anxiety

features.name: keep_distance
features.coding:
If someone tried to get close to me, I would try to keep my
distance
1 = strongly disagree
7 = strongly agree
Part of attachment avoidance

features.name: closeness_nervous
features.coding:
The idea of being emotionally close to someone makes me
nervous
1 = strongly disagree
7 = strongly agree
Part of attachment avoidance
